title: Entertaining
text: This was a Christmas surprise gift for my child. What can I say other than IT’s BIBBLE!  Fantastic purchase that entertains me as well as my kiddo. So vibrant in color and again IT’S BIBBLE!It hangs nicely on the wall of her bedroom.

title: Hilarious
text: We hung it up in our dorm room and everyone is terrified when they see it. 10/10 recommend

title: my favorite decoration in my room
text: this is one of my favorite memes so I had to get this tapestry. easily the first thing people notice in my room.

title: Literally perfect
text: I can’t stop laughing, the quality is so good for no reason, this is fantastic

title: WORSHIPPING BIBBLE
text: I'm too lazy atm to go take a better pic. anyways the tapestry is big but we had to make it work. everyone in our dorm loves it. we love bibble. everyone who comes in must take a pic with him or you can never come back. this is a godsend

title: Beautiful
text: Looks amazing in my daughters bedroom.

title: My bf absolutely loved this as his birthday gift
text: He is going to hang it on the wall and was super happy seeing it haha

title: Love this!
text: I gave this to my roommate as a gift and now its hanging in our college dorm. Seriously we get so many laughs from our friends! Bibble your a genius!

title: Get it right now
text: Dont even hesitate to get this beautiful tapestry of bibble on fire. It's 100% worth it.  A reason to keep going an inspiration rather. Particularly it's rather big and ur atypical tapestry material. I just tacked it to the wall and it works just fine. It's looks great with led lights. GetTHE BIBBLE TAPESTRY!!
